feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar punctuation styles with the use of commas and periods.

feature2.explanation: Both texts display a level of formality in word choice and sentence structures.

feature3.explanation: Sentence structures in both texts are relatively straightforward and coherent.

feature4.explanation: Both texts have a formal and informative tone without any distinctive narrative styles.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were found in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation, word choice, coherence, tone, and absence of errors, the overall likelihood of the texts being written by the same author is moderate.
